## Packages

Built using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) version `r quarto::quarto_version()` and the R packages:

```{r}
#| label: list-packages
#| results: asis

grateful::cite_packages(
    output   = "table",
    out.dir  = "resources",
    bib.file = "packages"
  ) %>%
  mutate(.before = Citation, ` ` = " ") %>%  # workaround to render as markdown
  kable(align = "lrl") %>%                   # table so pandoc recognizes
  column_spec(1, width = "5em") %>%          # citation keys
  column_spec(2, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "1.75em") %>%
  unclass() %>%
  cat()
```
